text: Millie Perkins (born May 12, 1938) is an American actress and model. She is best known for her role as Anne Frank in The Diary of Anne Frank (1959),Scheuer, Philip K. "Anne Frank's Role Settled: Millie Perkins, 18, Winner; Brynner's Schedule Busiest" , Los Angeles Times, January 29, 1958. Accessed June 2, 2008. "Diary has its Anne Frank. She is Millie Perkins, magazine cover-girl who was born in Passaic, N.J., 18 years ago and educated in Fair Lawn, N.J. and for her supporting actress roles in two 1966 westerns, The Shooting and Ride in the Whirlwind. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people Category:Models from New Jersey Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey
title: Millie Perkins
